if (NOT PROTOBUF_DIR)
	set(PROTOBUF_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CACHE STRING "Protobuf common directory")
	set(PROTOBUF_COMPILIER_DIR ${PROTOBUF_DIR}/protoc CACHE STRING "Protobuf compiler directory")

	if (WIN32)
		set(PROTOBUF_LIB_DIR ${PROTOBUF_DIR}/lib/windows CACHE STRING "Protobuf lLibraries directory")
	elseif (ANDROID_PLATFORM)
		if (ANDROID_ABI STREQUAL "arm64-v8a")
			set(PROTOBUF_LIB_DIR ${PROTOBUF_DIR}/lib/android/aarch64-linux-android CACHE STRING "Protobuf lLibraries directory")
		elseif (ANDROID_ABI STREQUAL "armeabi-v7a")
			set(PROTOBUF_LIB_DIR ${PROTOBUF_DIR}/lib/android/armv7a-linux-androideabi CACHE STRING "Protobuf lLibraries directory")
		else()
			message(FATAL_ERROR "Android abi ${ANDROID_ABI} is not supported.")
		endif()
	else()
		message(FATAL_ERROR "This platform is not supported.")
	endif()
endif()
